Get ESPN NBA team box scores

Source: R/espn_nba_data.R
espn_nba_team_box.Rd

Get ESPN NBA team box scores

espn_nba_team_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A team boxscore data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_nba_team_box(game_id = 401283399))
#> ── ESPN NBA Team Box Information from ESPN.com ────────────────── hoopR 1.7.0 ──
#> ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-16 21:51:02 UTC
#> # A tibble: 2 × 43

#> 1 401283399   2021           2 2021-02-18 Thunder                 s:40~l:46~t:25
#> 2 401283399   2021           2 2021-02-18 Grizzlies               s:40~l:46~t:29
#> # … with 37 more variables: team_alternate_color <chr>, team_color <chr>,
#> #   team_display_name <chr>, team_name <chr>, team_logo <chr>,
#> #   team_location <chr>, team_id <chr>, team_abbreviation <chr>,
#> #   team_slug <chr>, field_goals_made_field_goals_attempted <chr>,
#> #   field_goal_pct <chr>,
#> #   three_point_field_goals_made_three_point_field_goals_attempted <chr>,
#> #   three_point_field_goal_pct <chr>, …
# }
